title: Hoodlum Priest - Beneath The Pavement...The Beach (1994) (mp3)
description:
Hoodlum Priest - "Beneath The Pavement...The Beach" (1994) (mp3) (cover scans)

This is the very rare second album by the Hoodlum Priest (musician Derek Thompson, of Irish background, but born and raised in London).

The Hoodlum Priest's first album "Heart of Darkness" (1990) is also available here at TPB.

The bitrate of this release isn't great (80 kbps) because the album is a YouTube rip.  But it's still perfectly listenable, and it's very rare, so this is better than nothing!

Took me a long time to find.  Hope you enjoy it too!
